items.name: Stone
items.description: It's a rock. What more do you want?

items.name: Sand Stone
items.description: Crumbly yet sturdy enough to build with. Not great with water.

items.name: Copper
items.description: Basic but dependable. A beginner's best friend in the forge.

items.name: Iron
items.description: The workhorse of the forge. Reliable, versatile and a classic choice.

items.name: Cardboardite
items.description: Looks like trash, feels like trash... but somehow incredibly useful.

items.name: Tin
items.description: Weak on its own, but blends beautifully with others.

items.name: Silver
items.description: Malleable and pure. Naturally anti-curse, anti-werewolf, anti-everything-bad.

items.name: Gold
items.description: Not the strongest, but hey-it's gold. Fancy never goes out of style.

items.name: Bananite
items.description: Yellow, slippery, looks and smells like banana yet surprisingly durable.

items.name: Mushroomite
items.description: Grows in damp places. Sometimes glows. Sometimes talks. Probably fine.

items.name: Platinum
items.description: Smooth, silvery, and highly conductive. Rare and sought-after.

items.name: Aite
items.description: It's an ore made out of A's - but actually lightweight and razor sharp.

items.name: Poopite
items.description: Ew. Why is this even mineable?

items.name: Fichillium
items.description: PLAY ABYSS!

items.name: Cobalt
items.description: Resilient blue metal.

items.name: Titanium
items.description: Lightweight and unbreakable.

items.name: Lapis Lazuli
items.description: Deep blue, stores memories.

items.name: Volcanic Rock
items.description: Not just a rock.

items.name: Quartz
items.description: Amplifies rune energy.

items.name: Amethyst
items.description: Pulses with magical energy.

items.name: Topaz
items.rocks: Basalt Core, Basalt Vein, Volcanic Rock
items.description: Warm, golden, enchanting.

items.name: Diamond
items.description: Hardest material known.

items.name: Boneite
items.rocks: Bomber, Skeleton Rogue, Axe Skeleton, Deathaxe Skeleton
items.description: Formed from skeletal remains.

items.name: Sapphire
items.description: Deep blue and cold.

items.name: Slimite
items.description: Wiggly slime-like ore.

items.name: Cuprite
items.rocks: Basalt Core, Basalt Vein, Volcanic Rock
items.description: Bright red ore.

items.name: Obsidian
items.description: Volcanic glass.

items.name: Emerald
items.description: Smooth, vivid green gem.

items.name: Ruby
items.description: A furious red gem.

items.name: Dark Boneite
items.rocks: Elite Skeleton Rogue, Elite Deathaxe Skeleton, Reaper
items.description: Enhanced boneite infused with elite undead energy.

items.name: Rivalite
items.description: Strengthens near powerful metals.

items.name: Uranium
items.trait: 5% max HP AOE dmg on Armor
items.description: Dangerous and glowing.

items.name: Mythril
items.description: Durable lightweight metal.

items.name: Eye Ore
items.description: A blinking core stares back.

items.name: Fireite
items.description: Crackling hot.

items.name: Magmaite
items.description: Volatile molten ore.

items.name: Lightite
items.description: Bright and weightless.

items.name: Demonite
items.description: Pulses with dark heat.

items.name: Darkryte
items.description: Absorbs nearby light.

items.name: Orange Crystal Ore
items.description: Orange Crystal Ore is a epic ore with a exceptional 3x multiplier. Orange crystal from the Goblin Cave.

items.name: Magenta Crystal Ore
items.description: Magenta Crystal Ore is a epic ore with a exceptional 3.1x multiplier. Magenta crystal from the Goblin Cave.

items.name: Green Crystal Ore
items.description: Green Crystal Ore is a epic ore with a exceptional 3.2x multiplier. Green crystal from the Goblin Cave.

items.name: Crimson Crystal Ore
items.description: Crimson Crystal Ore is a epic ore with a exceptional 3.3x multiplier. Crimson crystal from the Goblin Cave.

items.name: Blue Crystal Ore
items.description: Blue Crystal Ore is a epic ore with a exceptional 3.4x multiplier. Blue crystal from the Goblin Cave.

items.name: Rainbow Crystal Ore
items.description: Rainbow Crystal Ore is a legendary ore with a exceptional 5.25x multiplier. Rare rainbow crystal.

items.name: Arcane Crystal Ore
items.description: Arcane Crystal Ore is a mythical ore with a exceptional 7.5x multiplier. Extremely rare arcane crystal.

items.name: Grass
items.description: No description available.

items.name: Tungsten
items.rocks: Icy Pebble, Icy Rock, Icy Boulder
items.description: Unyielding and absurdly dense. You feel more motivated just holding it.

items.name: Sulfur
items.rocks: Icy Pebble, Icy Rock, Icy Boulder
items.description: Yellow, brittle, and smells exactly how you expect. Useful, dangerous, and easy to regret.

items.name: Pumice
items.rocks: Icy Pebble, Icy Rock, Icy Boulder
items.description: Light, brittle, and full of air pockets. Floats briefly before remembering it's a rock.

items.name: Scheelite
items.rocks: Icy Rock, Icy Boulder, Small Ice Crystal
items.description: Dull at first glance, valuable once refined. The kind of ore that rewards patience.

items.name: Graphite
items.rocks: Icy Pebble, Icy Rock, Icy Boulder
items.description: Plain, dark, and deceptively useful. Not flashy, but it gets the job done without complaints.

items.name: Aetherit
items.rocks: Icy Pebble, Icy Rock, Icy Boulder, Small Ice Crystal
items.description: A broken piece of raw magic. Sharp, unstable, and absolutely not safe to pocket.

items.name: Larimar
items.rocks: Icy Rock, Icy Boulder, Small Ice Crystal
items.description: Soft blue stone infused with calm energy. Holding it makes the caves feel less hostile, briefly.

items.name: Neurotite
items.rocks: Icy Rock, Icy Boulder, Small Ice Crystal
items.description: Warm and faintly organic in texture. Staying near it too long gives you strange ideas.

items.name: Frost Fossil
items.rocks: Icy Boulder, Small Ice Crystal, Medium Ice Crystal
items.description: Ancient remains frozen solid in eternal ice. Whatever it once was, it never got to finish dying.

items.name: Tide Carve
items.rocks: Icy Boulder, Small Ice Crystal, Medium Ice Crystal
items.description: Shaped by relentless water pressure. Every edge tells a story of erosion and survival.

items.name: Velchire
items.rocks: Icy Boulder, Small Ice Crystal, Medium Ice Crystal, Large Ice Crystal, Floating Crystal
items.description: Smooth, refined, and unnaturally cold. Looks expensive even before forging.

items.name: Sanctis
items.rocks: Icy Boulder, Small Ice Crystal, Medium Ice Crystal, Large Ice Crystal, Floating Crystal
items.description: Clean, radiant, and unnervingly pure. Feels wrong to break, but you do it anyway.

items.name: Snowite
items.trait: +15% Attack Speed, Movement Speed reduction 3s (30% chance - Weapon)
items.rocks: Icy Pebble, Icy Rock, Icy Boulder, Small Ice Crystal
items.description: Light, sharp, and infused with wind energy. It almost floats when freshly mined.

items.name: Iceite
items.trait: Freeze enemies for 2 seconds (25% chance, 12s cooldown)
items.rocks: Icy Rock, Icy Boulder, Small Ice Crystal, Medium Ice Crystal, Large Ice Crystal, Floating Crystal
items.description: Light, sharp, and infused with wind energy. It almost floats when freshly mined.

items.name: Frogite
items.description: Frogite is an epic ore with a solid 8.5x multiplier. Its unique trait provides +10% Jump Height when used in armor crafting.

items.name: Moon Stone
items.description: Moon Stone is a legendary ore with a strong 9.5x multiplier. Its unique trait provides +20% DMG at night when used in weapon crafting.

items.name: Gulabite
items.description: Gulabite is a legendary ore with an excellent 9.99x multiplier. A pure stat-boosting ore with no special effects.

items.name: Coinite
items.description: Coinite is a legendary ore with a unique property - while it only has a 1x crafting multiplier, it sells for 15x the normal value, making it ideal for profit.

items.name: Duranite
items.description: Duranite is a mythical ore with an impressive 12x multiplier. Its unique trait provides +7.5% Durability when used in armor crafting.

items.name: Evil Eye
items.description: Evil Eye is a mythical ore with an excellent 13.3x multiplier. A pure stat-boosting ore with no special effects.

items.name: Prismatic Heart
items.description: Prismatic Heart is a legendary ore with a 5.5x multiplier. Its unique trait provides 20% Crit Chance, 5% Crit DMG, and 15% Slow (18s CD) when used in weapon crafting.

items.name: Yeti Heart
items.description: Yeti Heart is a mythical ore with a 7.7x multiplier. Its unique trait provides 30% Crit Chance, 10% Crit DMG, and 10% Attack Speed when used in weapon crafting.

items.name: Stolen Heart
items.description: Stolen Heart is a relic ore with an outstanding 15.4x multiplier. Its unique trait provides 20% chance for 3% lifesteal per hit when used in armor crafting.

items.name: Golem Heart
items.description: Golem Heart is a divine ore with a solid 10x multiplier. Its unique trait provides 40% Crit Chance, 15% Crit DMG, and 25% Slow (3s) when used in weapon crafting.

items.name: Heart of The Island
items.description: Heart Of The Island is a relic ore with the highest multiplier in Raven's Cave at 18.5x. Its unique trait provides +30% Vitality and heals 50% HP when below 20% (2 min cooldown).

items.name: Mistvein
items.rocks: Small Ice Crystal, Medium Ice Crystal, Large Ice Crystal, Floating Crystal
items.description: Veined with drifting fog trapped inside the rock. Crack it open and the mist escapes instantly.

items.name: Lgarite
items.rocks: Small Ice Crystal, Medium Ice Crystal, Large Ice Crystal, Floating Crystal
items.description: Jagged and oddly refined at the same time. Looks artificial, but no one remembers making it.

items.name: Voidfractal
items.rocks: Small Ice Crystal, Medium Ice Crystal, Large Ice Crystal, Floating Crystal
items.description: Endless patterns folded into solid matter. Staring too long makes your head hurt.

items.name: Moltenfrost
items.rocks: Small Ice Crystal, Medium Ice Crystal, Large Ice Crystal, Floating Crystal
items.description: Burns and freezes at the same time. Physics gave up trying to explain this one.

items.name: Crimsonite
items.rocks: Small Ice Crystal, Medium Ice Crystal, Large Ice Crystal, Floating Crystal
items.description: A deep red ore that radiates heat and anger. Miners swear it pulses when blood is nearby.

items.name: Malachite
items.trait: +10% weapon dmg as poison/sec for 3s (33% chance - Weapon)
items.rocks: Medium Ice Crystal, Large Ice Crystal, Floating Crystal
items.description: Green, layered, and rich with minerals. Breaks cleanly, like it's used to being harvested.

items.name: Aqujade
items.rocks: Medium Ice Crystal, Large Ice Crystal, Floating Crystal
items.description: Smooth, cool and heavy with ocean energy. Feels like it's been underwater longer than history.

items.name: Cryptex
items.rocks: Medium Ice Crystal, Large Ice Crystal, Floating Crystal
items.description: Layered with shifting patterns that never stay the same. No one agrees on what's inside.

items.name: Galestor
items.rocks: Medium Ice Crystal, Large Ice Crystal, Floating Crystal
items.description: Lightweight and charged with constant motion. Even at rest, it feels like it wants to escape.

items.name: Voidstar
items.rocks: Medium Ice Crystal, Large Ice Crystal, Floating Crystal
items.description: A collapsed point of pure darkness. It absorbs light, sound, and occasionally hope.

items.name: Etherealite
items.description: Almost invisible unless the light hits it just right. It flickers between existing and not bothering to.

items.name: Suryafal
items.rocks: Small Ice Crystal, Medium Ice Crystal, Large Ice Crystal, Floating Crystal
items.description: Sun-charged stone that radiates steady heat. Mining it feels like standing too close to daylight.

items.name: Heavenite
items.description: Warm to the touch and faintly glowing. Some say it fell from the sky, others say it was pushed.

items.name: Gargantuan
items.trait: 20% weapon dmg as fire/sec for 2s (20%). Explosion 50% AOE (35% - Weapon)
items.description: Dense, oversized, and brutally heavy. It takes effort just to remind it who's holding the pickaxe.

items.name: Mosasaursit
items.description: A fossilized skeleton of a prehistoric sea creature, its bones preserved by the cold waters of the island.

items.name: Galaxite
items.description: Galaxite is a divine ore with a exceptional 11.5x multiplier. The rarest ore in existence. Currently unobtainable.
